argument.color.hex.invalidString: Hex integer must be exactly 6 characters long, found %d characters.
argument.color.hex.invalidChar: Invalid character for hex integer: %s. Valid characters: [0-9a-fA-F]
key.skyblocker.defaultTgl: Switch tab HUD to default view
text.skyblocker.quit_config_sure: Are you sure you want to quit editing the config? Changes will not be saved!
text.skyblocker.clickToSend.@Tooltip: Click to send this in chat.
skyblocker.config.title: Skyblocker Settings
skyblocker.config.crimsonIsle.extendNeth: When in the Crimson Isle, prevents fog from appearing closer to the player as it does in vanilla nether biomes.
skyblocker.config.crimsonIsle.kuudra.arr:
If the amount of Toxic Arrow Poison you have in your inventory is below the set threshold, then you will receive a warning.

16 is the absolute minimum.
You want 32 for smooth 'DPS' phase with prefire.
skyblocker.config.crimsonIsle.kuudra.dan: Displays a warning when you're in danger from a tentacle slam or from TNT. The color of the warning adapts to the danger level!
skyblocker.config.crimsonIsle.kuudra.kuu: Outlines Kuudra in a deep orange.
skyblocker.config.crimsonIsle.kuudra.noA: Warns you when you pull out a bow and have no Toxic Arrow Poison in your inventory. Only works during the DPS phase.
skyblocker.config.debug.dumpFormat.@Tool: The format to use when dumping items. SNBT is colored and easier to read while JSON has escaped string characters (double quotes).
skyblocker.config.debug.dumpRange.@Toolt: The range in blocks around the player to dump entities within.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.allowDropping: Enabled Dropping Protected Items & on Locked Slots
Allows the use of class abilities in Dungeons on a locked slot or while holding an item which has been protected using /skyblocker protectItem.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.croesusHelper: Gray out chests that have already been opened.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.classBasedPla: Changes the color of your teammates glow to be based on their class rather than their rank.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.goldorWaypoin: Enable waypoints for terminals/devices/levers during Goldor
skyblocker.config.dungeons.devices.solve: Highlights the correct levers to click in red
Highlights the correct button to click in green, and highlights the next one in yellow.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.doorHighlight:
Highlight: Only displays a highlight.

Outlined Highlight: Displays both a highlight and an outline.

Outline: Only displays an outline.
Note: Dungeon Secret Waypoints must be enabled for this to work.
Highlights wither and blood doors red if locked and green if unlocked.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.dungeonChestP:
Highlights chests with the best profit at the Croesus NPC.


The best chest will be highlighted green.
If there is a chest worth using dungeon key on, it will be highlighted yellow

Displays the profit of a dungeon chest in the chest screen's title.
Green if there's profit.
Red if there isn't profit.
Gray if you don't gain or lose anything.
Blue if calculations were based on incomplete data.
Disabling is **not recommended** if you're a forgetful person.
When enabled, if you used a kismet, the price of one will be subtracted from the profit
The color to display when the price data is incomplete.
The threshold below which the profit is considered neutral.
Message which will be sent in the chat when reaching threshold score before getting 5+ crypts. The string "[crypts]" will be replaced with the amount of crypts.

Default 270 is intended for S+ runs when you enter at 300+ score - which is usually F5-F7 and M5-M7. 
If you are running S runs (enter at 270 score) then you should consider lowering this to 250 or less, otherwise it will be useless
Message which will be sent in the chat when reaching %d score in dungeons. The string "[score]" will be replaced with the dungeon score (%d).
Sends a message in chat if less than 5 crypts are found when the score threshold is reached.
Sends a message in chat when reaching %d score in dungeons.
Plays a sound when reaching %d score in dungeons.
Display a title when reaching %d score in dungeons.
Displays the dungeon score in the HUD.

Note: This only works correctly if death messages are enabled in your skyblock settings. If you want to hide death messages, use this mod's Hide Player Death Messages setting instead to allow further processing of death messages.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.hideSoulweave: Hides the Haunted Skulls spawned that are spawned as a result of using Soulweaver Gloves.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.livid.enableS: Enable Glow and/or Bounding use same color
Instead of Livid color an Red color is Shown
skyblocker.config.dungeons.livid.enableL: Applies the glowing effect to the correct Livid in F5/M5.
Applies a bounding box to the correct Livid in F5/M5.
Send the livid color in the chat during the Livid boss fight.
Display the livid color in the title during the Livid boss fight.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.livid.lividCo: Text which will be sent in the chat during the Livid boss fight. The string "[color]" will be replaced with the livid color.
Message which will be sent in the chat upon killing a mimic. Recommended to retain the default value.
Sends a message in chat upon killing a mimic for other players' score calculation mods.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.playerSecrets: Tracks the number of secrets people in your dungeon run are doing.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.professor.fir: Display a timer when to use a Fire Freeze Staff in the F3/M3 boss fight.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.professor.flo: Displays guardian's health below them in the F3/M3 boss fight.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.puzzle.blazeS: Boxes the correct blaze in green, also draws a line to and boxes the next blaze to kill in white.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.puzzle.creepe: Highlights the best beams to make and the targets to hit.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.puzzle.solveB: Draws a line to the chest and highlight button
skyblocker.config.dungeons.puzzle.solveT: Puts a red box around the next best move for you to make!
skyblocker.config.dungeons.puzzle.solveW: Click the levers with green boxes to solve the puzzle.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.salvageHelper: Highlights items picked up in dungeons that can be salvaged.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.secretWaypoin: This includes all waypoints that do not belong to a category.
With these waypoints, you throw a pearl towards the block and at the same time AOTV up.
Disabling this option can save around 20 MB of RAM, but Secret Waypoint and §lsome puzzle solvers §rrequire this option to be enabled.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.starredMobBou: Draws the bounding boxes of starred mobs.
skyblocker.config.dungeons.starredMobGlo:
Applies the glowing effect to starred mobs that are visible.

Note that using this will result in the teammate glow no longer being visible through walls when a starred mob is present.
skyblocker.config.farming.garden.closeSc: Whether or not your inventory should automatically close when teleporting to a plot using the Garden Plots Widget
skyblocker.config.farming.garden.gardenP: While in the garden, on the right of your inventory there will be a widget to quickly teleport to plots. It will also show plots that have pests (this requires the Pests widget to be enabled and visible in the Tab).
skyblocker.config.farming.garden.lockMou: Only lock camera when on the ground
Lock camera when holding a farming tool
skyblocker.config.general.chestValue.@To: Calculate the value of this container.
skyblocker.config.general.minionValue.@T: Calculate the value of this minion's generated resources.
skyblocker.config.general.itemInfoDispla: Choose between a circular or a square background style!
Displays a colored background behind an item, the color represents the item's rarity.
skyblocker.config.general.itemProtection: Prevents consuming items such as Bottles of Jyrre, Dark Cacao Truffles, and Discrite before they have evolved.
Choose between the fancy or the classic slot lock icon.
skyblocker.config.general.itemTooltip.av: You can choose how many days of average price to be
skyblocker.config.general.itemTooltip.du:
Displays quality and tier of dungeon drops from mobs.


Reminder:
Tier 1-3 dropped from F1-F3
Tier 4-7 dropped from F4-F7 or M1-M4
Tier 8-10 are dropped only from M5-M7
skyblocker.config.general.itemTooltip.en: Enable Accessories Helper
When hovering over an accessory, you are informed about whether you already have it or not, and whether it's worse than what you have already collected or better. List of Statuses:
You have the highest tier accessory from that family.
This accessory is an upgrade from the one that you already have in the same family. Also shows you what tier this accessory is in its family.
This accessory can be upgraded. Also tells you what tier of accessory you have in that family.
You already own an accessory in the same family that is better than this one. Also tells you what tier of accessory you have in that family.
You don't own any accessory from this family.
Enable Avg. BIN Price
Enable Bazaar buy/sell Price
skyblocker.config.general.itemTooltip.cr: You can choose which Bazaar order type to use in crafting calculation
skyblocker.config.general.itemTooltip.en: Enable Exotic Tooltip
Displays the type of exotic below the item's name if an armor piece is exotic.
Enable Lowest BIN Price
Enable Motes Price
Displays the Motes sell price of an item while in The Rift.
Enable Museum Info

If this item is donatable to the museum, then the item's category in the museum is displayed. It also displays a marker indicating whether you've donated that item to your museum or not (freebies not yet supported).

Make sure to enable your Museum API for accurate information!
Enable Estimated Item Value

Displays an estimation of the item's total value in the tooltip, §lmight not be 100% accurate all the time.§r

When selling items always do a manual check of the item price!
Enable NPC Price
Enable Obtained Date
Enable Stacking Enchant Progress
Displays the progress to the next level of a stacking enchantment if it hasn't been maxed.
Enable Quiver Warning After a Dungeon
Only show pets that are max level
skyblocker.config.general.shortcuts.enab: Shortcuts that replace one or more word(s)/argument(s) of a command which has multiple words/arguments. Edit shortcuts with "/skyblocker shortcuts". Shortcuts must be enabled for this to take effect.
Shortcuts for commands consisting of only one word. Edit shortcuts with "/skyblocker shortcuts". Shortcuts must be enabled for this to take effect.
Works anywhere, even in vanilla! Edit shortcuts with "/skyblocker shortcuts". At least one of the following options must be enabled for this to take effect.
skyblocker.config.general.specialEffects: Adds a special visual effect triggered upon obtaining rare dungeon loot!
Adds a special visual effect triggered upon dropping a rare dye!
Choose between receiving notifications for releases, for both releases and betas, or for releases; betas; and alphas.
skyblocker.config.general.wikiLookup.ena: Opens the wiki page of the hovered item with the F4 key.
skyblocker.config.general.wikiLookup.off: Use the official wiki instead of the Fandom wiki.
skyblocker.config.helpers.bazaar.enableB:
Draws icons on top of orders to explain the current state of the order.

%s: Order is going to expire soon
%s: Order has expired
%s: Order is filled to some degree and there are items/coins to claim
%s: Order is filled
skyblocker.config.helpers.chocolateFacto:
Highlights the best upgrade when enabled. 

The best upgrade is marked as green, but if you can't afford it, it's marked as yellow while marking the next best upgrade that you can afford as green.
Sends a message in chat when your Time Tower deactivates.
Sends a message in chat when an egg is found in the current island.
Repeatedly plays a ding while a stray rabbit is present. If it is golden, the sound will be more frequent and different.
skyblocker.config.helpers.enableNewYearC:
Highlights the missing new year cakes green and the cakes you have already red.

Requires you to open your cake bag at least once to work.
skyblocker.config.helpers.enableBitsHelp: Highlight best Community Store (Bits Shop) offer

Highlights best offers in Community Store (Bits Shop). Also shows coins per bit. Green if best offer that is in list of items that quickly sell. Yellow for best offer overall - may include stuff that sells once in a year. 

Both may include price manipulated items - please use common sense or at least 1day/3day avg tooltip
skyblocker.config.helpers.enableWardrobe: Allows changing armor from the wardrobe by pressing hotbar keys 1-9 while the menu is open. The corresponding armor set in the wardrobe menu will be equipped.
skyblocker.config.helpers.fairySouls.hig: When enabled only fairy souls in a radius of 50 blocks are highlighted
skyblocker.config.helpers.fishing.change: Changes timer to green after 20 seconds has passed
skyblocker.config.helpers.fishing.fishin: How big to display the fishing timer
skyblocker.config.helpers.fishing.hideOt: Hide other players' fishing rods from showing for you
skyblocker.config.helpers.itemPrice.enab: Searches the Bazaar and AH for the current hovered item with the F6 key.
skyblocker.config.helpers.itemPrice.item: Failed to find item in the Bazaar and Auction House
skyblocker.config.helpers.itemPrice.enab: Refresh the Bazaar and AH prices with the Z key.
skyblocker.config.helpers.jerry.enableJe: Sends a message in chat and plays a sound when the hidden jerry spawn cooldown is over.
skyblocker.config.chat.chatRules.announc: The amount of time the announcement will show for in ticks.
The amount to scale the size of the announcement.
Are you sure you want to remove this rule?
Rule '%s' will be lost forever! (A long time!)
Show the message in your action bar.
Show the message in the Title Container. It's position and scale can be changed in the UI & Visuals category of the mod settings.
The string/regex to match a chat message to.
List of locations where the filter will work. Separate each location with a "," and use a "!" if you want it to work anywhere but a location. Location Names:
If the filter can match part of the chat message.
If the filter uses regex or is just a string.
Input a new message to output (can be formatted using minecraft color codes).
Play a sound when the message is sent.
skyblocker.config.chat.waypoints.display: Displayed temporary waypoint at x: %d, y: %d, z: %d | %s
skyblocker.config.chat.confirmationPromp:
Upon receiving a yes or no prompt in chat, you can click anywhere on the screen within 60 seconds to accept the prompt.

An example of this is Trevor the Trapper's tasks.
skyblocker.config.chat.filter.hideAOTE.@: Hides those pesky "There are blocks in the way!" messages.
Filters the player death messages from chat.
Filters the Dicer messages from chat.
skyblocker.config.chat.filter.hideMana: Hide Mana Consumption Messages from Action Bar
skyblocker.config.chat.filter.hideMana.@: Gives a better experience with FancyBar
skyblocker.config.chat.filter.hideMimicK: Filters the "Mimic dead!" and "Mimic killed!" messages from chat.
skyblocker.config.chat.filter.hideToggle: Hides those pesky messages telling you to disable the Sky Mall HOTM perk when you want it enabled!
skyblocker.config.chat.skyblockXpMessage: Notifies you in the chat when you gain SkyBlock XP.
skyblocker.config.eventNotifications.mon: can you pls log onto skyblock rq pls? that would be cool cuz like if you are seeing dis then it means that ur config either got cleared or that this is ur first time using the mod if so then thanks for choosing it and hopefully you enjoy it! so yea this is where you will be able to set reminders for all events in skyblock they will be added as you encounter so you first need to log onto skyblock so yea hope you enjoy the mod and all that
skyblocker.config.eventNotifications.@To: Configure how much time before an event you will be reminded with a notification toast! For example if you set '5m' and '30s' in the list, you will receive a notification 5 minutes before and another 30 seconds before an event starts.
The order doesn't matter. If you want to disable notifications, just empty the list.
This list will modify the '%s' event
skyblocker.config.mining.commissionWaypo: Off: Do not show Commission waypoint.
Dwarven: Show waypoints only in dwarven mines.
Glacite: Show waypoints only in glacite tunnels.
Both: Show waypoints in dwarven mines and glacite tunnels.
Color the waypoint text to match the block it's for.
Show waypoint for basecamp when in glacite tunnels (takes effect when commissions updated).
When a commission in the dwarven mines is finished show emissary locations (takes effect when commissions updated).
Helper for the metal detector puzzle in the Mines of Divan.
Show waypoints to the Nucleus in the Crystal Hollows.
Highlight found treasure chests and lock pick locations when powder mining.
What color the treasure chests / lock pick should be highlighted.
Choose which items to show & include in the profit calculation for the powder tracker.
skyblocker.config.mining.crystalsHud.sho: Show boxes on important areas in the crystal hollows e.g. Jungle Temple and Fairy Grotto.
How big the locations show up on the map.
skyblocker.config.mining.crystalsWaypoin: Crystal Hollows Waypoints
Enabled Waypoints
Show a waypoint (waypoint selected in general/waypoints) at important areas in the crystal hollows, e.g., Jungle Temple and Fairy Grotto.
Find Waypoints In Chat
When in crystal hollows read the chat to see if coordinates are sent and extract these to show as waypoint or on the map
Added waypoint for '%s' at %d %d %d.
You have no active waypoints to share or remove.
You have no more waypoints left to create.
Mark (%s) as: %s
Add Location
Remove Location
Share Location
Can only share waypoints you have found.
Removed waypoint for
Can only remove waypoints you have found.
Share Fairy Grotto
Share Fairy Grotto locations to the web socket.
Wishing Compass Solver
Calculates and adds a waypoint at the location indicated by wishing compasses.
Enable crystals in the /tab to allow the compass to identify discovered items
Enable effects in the /tab to allow the compass to identify queen coordinates
Wishing compass used. Move to another location and use a second compass to triangulate the target
The lines did not intersect (Something went wrong) please try again.
The target location is too far away to identify the structure, possibly due to a missing structure in the lobby.
Wishing compass solver found
Use compass outside of nucleus for better results
Move further away from the first use before using again
Changed zone. Restarting...
Wait a moment before using another wishing compass
Unable to detect the last use. Restarting...
skyblocker.config.mining.dwarvenHud.styl: Fancy: Shows name, percentage, progress bar and an icon.
Classic: Shows name and percentage in a very simple box.
skyblocker.config.mining.dwarvenMines.en: Highlights unbreakable carpets within ore veins in the Dwarven Mines.
skyblocker.config.mining.dwarvenMines.ca: Sets the color of the highlight for the unbreakable carpets.
skyblocker.config.mining.glacite.coldOve: Shows a frosty overlay in the Glacite mines that gets stronger as you get colder.
skyblocker.config.mining.glacite.enableC: Creates waypoints for corpses. Allows for sharing them.
skyblocker.config.mining.glacite.enableP: If enabled, will listen to chat and process corpses shared by other players. Should be compatible with other mods.
skyblocker.config.mining.glacite.autoSha: Automatically Share Found Corpses In Chat
Sends a message in party chat with the location of the found corpse when you find one.
skyblocker.config.misc.richPresence.info: This value doesn't matter if you are cycling
skyblocker.config.otherLocations.rift.bl: Applies the glowing effect to the Blobbercysts from the BACTE fight.
skyblocker.config.otherLocations.rift.en: Note: Many enigma souls have a small task you must complete to get them, so it's recommended to also watch a YouTube video when finding them.
skyblocker.config.otherLocations.rift.mc: Used for calculating Motes sell prices.
skyblocker.config.quickNav.button.item.c:
A string of item components enclosed in square brackets, which is the same format as the /give command.

Example: [minecraft:enchantment_glint_override=true]
skyblocker.config.quickNav.button.toolti:
Tooltip shown when hovering your mouse over the button.

You can use text json format.
Putting nothing will make the tooltip not render.
skyblocker.config.slayer.enableHud.@Tool: You may have to do 1 boss before all HUD elements show
skyblocker.config.slayer.blazeSlayer.ena: Countdowns the last five seconds before the Fire Pillar explodes. Configure 'Title Container' to customise the location on the HUD (Note: This only uses a rudimentary distance check, so the Pillar may be spawned by another player's slayer)
skyblocker.config.slayer.blazeSlayer.att: If Boss Highlighting is on, applies a color matching the current attunement to the selected effect.
skyblocker.config.slayer.bossbar.@Toolti: Displays a bossbar for your active slayer boss
Displays a warning when a slayer boss spawns
OFF: Do not highlight Slayer Minibosses.
GLOW: Creates a glow effect on Slayer Minibosses. Due to technical limitations, there is a small chance of this option making mistakes in mob detection
HITBOX: Display a Hitbox around Slayer Minibosses
skyblocker.config.slayer.highlightBosses: OFF: Do not highlight Slayer Bosses.
GLOW: Creates a glow effect on Slayer Bosses. Due to technical limitations, there is a small chance of this option making mistakes in mob detection
HITBOX: Display a Hitbox around the Slayer Boss
This option is required for Blazeslayer Attunement Highlighting
skyblocker.config.slayer.minibossSpawnAl: Displays a warning when a slayer miniboss spawns
skyblocker.config.slayer.slainTime.@Tool: Sends the amount of time spent to kill the slayer.
skyblocker.config.slayer.vampireSlayer.e: The lower the value, the more frequent the updates, which may cause lag.
skyblocker.config.slayer.vampireSlayer.h: The lower the value, the more frequent the updates, which may cause lag.
skyblocker.config.slayer.vampireSlayer.m: The lower the value, the more frequent the updates, which may cause lag.
skyblocker.config.slayer.vampireSlayer.s: The lower the value, the more frequent the updates, which may cause lag.
skyblocker.config.uiAndVisuals.nightVisi: Determines the strength of the Night Vision effect.
skyblocker.config.uiAndVisuals.backpackP: View backpack preview without holding Shift
skyblocker.config.uiAndVisuals.bars: Health, Mana, Defence, Speed & XP Bars
skyblocker.config.uiAndVisuals.cancelCom: Cancels the down-and-up animation in your hand that plays when an item's components are updated.
skyblocker.config.uiAndVisuals.chestValu: Adds a button in containers to calculate the value of a container.
The color to display when the price data is incomplete.
skyblocker.config.uiAndVisuals.compactDa: The number of digits to display after the decimal point.
skyblocker.config.uiAndVisuals.dontStrip:
When enabled, the alpha values of pixels in skin textures are no longer stripped while in Skyblock.

This results in the "filler" pixels on items using Player Heads to now be completely transparent, although this may have some side effects in odd cases.
skyblocker.config.uiAndVisuals.hideEmpty: Hide empty item tooltips in menus
Hides the tooltip of an item if it doesn't have any information to display. Also blocks clicks on filler items like glass panes.
skyblocker.config.uiAndVisuals.inputCalc:
Enables the ability for you to do calculations when inputting values such as price for the ah.
 Key:
  S = 64
  E = 160
  K = 1,000
  M = 1,000,000
  B = 1,000,000,000

 purse/P = current purse value
Only show the calculator when the message starts with "=".
Close the current open sign screen with the enter key
skyblocker.config.uiAndVisuals.inventory: Use CTRL + K for inventory search instead of CTRL + F
Use CMD + K for inventory search instead of CMD + F
Shows a clickable text at the top of the screen to open the search field.
Displays information such as enchantment book level, minion level, pet level, potion level, prehistoric egg blocks walked, rancher's boots speed cap, and skill level
Displays the attribute's level and the initials of the attribute's name.
Displays the level of the upgrades in the community shop.
Displays the levels and your current amount of essence while in essence shops.
Displays if you learned a power or not in the power stones guide.
Displays your current number of blocks traveled with the egg.
Displays your assigned and unassigned tuning points
skyblocker.config.uiAndVisuals.searchOve: Show custom search overlay when searching in the auction house.
Show custom search overlay when searching in bazaar.
Opens the bazaar search with "/bzs" and auction house with "/ahs". A re-log is required for this setting to be updated.
The length of search history to save and display for the overlay.
Keep the existing search queue when opening overlay.
The maximum number of suggested items to show.
skyblocker.config.uiAndVisuals.tabHud.en: Enables the background of the non-tab HUD.
skyblocker.config.uiAndVisuals.tabHud.ef: If on, will fetch current effects from the tab footer if the Hypixel Effects Widget is disabled.
skyblocker.config.uiAndVisuals.tabHud.ta: Scale factor of fancy tab HUD
Value in %, relative to your vanilla GUI scale
skyblocker.config.uiAndVisuals.titleCont: Used to display multiple titles at once, Example use: Vampire Slayer
skyblocker.config.uiAndVisuals.waypoints:
Waypoint: Displays a highlight and a beacon beam.

Outlined Waypoint: Displays both a waypoint and an outline.

Highlight: Only displays a highlight.

Outlined Highlight: Displays both a highlight and an outline.

Outline: Only displays an outline.
This option does not apply to all waypoints. Some waypoints such as secret waypoints have their own waypoint type option.
skyblocker.updateNotifications.newUpdate: There's a new Skyblocker update available! %s
skyblocker.utils.locationUpdateError: Failed to update your location! Some features of the mod may not work properly :(
skyblocker.reparty.notInPartyOrNotLeader: You must be in a party and be the leader of it to reparty!
skyblocker.reparty.error: Failed to reparty, try again in a moment!
skyblocker.itemTooltip.nullMessage: §cItem price information on tooltip will renew in max 60 seconds. If not, check latest.log
skyblocker.wikiLookup.noArticleFound: §rUnable to locate a wiki article for this item...
skyblocker.debug.toggledShowingInvisible: Toggled showing invisible armor stands to %s
skyblocker.bars.config.explanation:
Welcome to the status bars config screen!

Drag and drop the bars to snap them to an anchor (white squares) or existing bars.
You can right click them to edit a bunch of properties.
By hovering your mouse between 2 bars (your cursor should change), you can resize them.

Everything is saved when you leave
skyblocker.updateRepository.loading: §cAnother process is currently updating the local repository, please try again in a moment.
skyblocker.updateRepository.deleted: §bDeleted the local repository successfully, downloading new files... This will take a minute!
skyblocker.updateRepository.failed: §cUpdating the local repository failed. See logs for details.
skyblocker.updateRepository.error: §cEncountered an error while deleting and updating the local repository. Try again in a moment or remove the files manually and restart the game. See logs for details.
skyblocker.museum.attemptingResync: Attempting to resync your museum item donations...
skyblocker.museum.cannotResync: Cannot resync your museum item donations! Note that you can only do this once every two days.
skyblocker.museum.resyncSuccess: Successfully resynced your museum item donations!
skyblocker.museum.resyncFailure: Failed to resync your museum item donations!
skyblocker.dungeons.secrets.physicalEntr: §cDungeon Entrance Room coordinates not found. Please go back to the green Entrance Room.
skyblocker.dungeons.secrets.markSecretsM: §rMarked all secrets in this room as missing.
§cUnable to mark secrets in this room as missing.
skyblocker.dungeons.secrets.noTarget: §cNo target block found! (Are you pointing at a block in range?)
skyblocker.dungeons.secrets.notMatched: §cThe current room is not matched! (Are you in a dungeon room?)
skyblocker.dungeons.secrets.customWaypoi: §rAdded a custom waypoint at X: %d, Y: %d, Z: %d for room %s secret #%d of category %s with name '%s'.
§rRemoved custom waypoint at X: %d, Y: %d, Z: %d for room %s secret #%d of category %s with name '%s'.
§cNo custom waypoint found at X: %d, Y: %d, Z: %d for room %s.
skyblocker.dungeons.secretsTracker.failF: §cUnable to calculate the number of secrets everybody did this run!
skyblocker.api.cache.HIT:
This data was cached!
It's %d seconds old.
skyblocker.api.token.authFailure: Failed to refresh your Skyblocker API token, some features may not work temporarily!

skyblocker.webSocket.receivedCrystalsWay: Received a waypoint to %s from the Skyblocker WebSocket.

skyblocker.quiverWarning.10Left: You only have 10 Arrows left in your Quiver!

skyblocker.tips.customItemNames: Customize the names of your items with /skyblocker custom renameItem
skyblocker.tips.customArmorDyeColors: Apply a custom dye color to your leather armor with /skyblocker custom dyeColor
skyblocker.tips.customArmorTrims: You can set custom armor trims on your armor using /skyblocker custom armorTrim.
skyblocker.tips.customAnimatedDyes: You can apply a custom animated dye to your leather armor with /skyblocker custom animatedDye!
skyblocker.tips.fancyTabExtraInfo: Did you know you can see extra info on our fancy tab menu when holding N or M?
skyblocker.tips.helpCommand: Use command /skyblocker help and you might find some more nifty features!
skyblocker.tips.discordRichPresence: Use Discord Rich Presence to show your friends how loaded you are!
skyblocker.tips.customDungeonSecretWaypo: You can add custom secret waypoints to any dungeon room with /skyblocker dungeons secrets addWaypoint.
skyblocker.tips.shortcuts: Use /skyblocker shortcuts to create and edit command and message shortcuts.
skyblocker.tips.gallery: Check out https://hysky.de/skyblocker/gallery for pictures of the mod's features in action!
skyblocker.tips.itemRarityBackground: See an item's rarity easily with Item Rarity Backgrounds in the config's Item Info Display section.
skyblocker.tips.modMenuUpdate: ModMenu will let you know if there's an update available for Skyblocker for your game version.
skyblocker.tips.issues: Submit bug reports and feature requests to https://github.com/SkyblockerMod/Skyblocker.
skyblocker.tips.beta: We often have beta versions available from GitHub Actions that contain new and experimental features.
skyblocker.tips.contribute: We welcome contributions to the mod! See https://github.com/SkyblockerMod/Skyblocker/wiki/contribute for more info.
skyblocker.tips.discord: Join our discord at https://discord.gg/aNNJHQykck to keep up with the latest news about Skyblocker!
skyblocker.tips.flameOverlay: Find that the flame overlay takes up too much screen space? Check out the config to make it smaller
skyblocker.tips.wikiLookup: Press F4 while hovering over an item to open its wiki page in your web browser.
skyblocker.tips.protectItem: Prevent accidentally dropping your items with /skyblocker protectItem.
skyblocker.tips.fairySoulsEnigmaSoulsRel: Don't know where to find Fairy Souls, Enigma Souls, or Relics? Enable the helpers to aid your exploration; they'll remember which souls you've already found.
skyblocker.tips.quickNav: You can customize the QuickNav buttons in the config.
skyblocker.tips.waypoints: You can import (including from skytils), add, remove, and toggle waypoints on any island with /skyblocker waypoints.
skyblocker.tips.orderedWaypoints: You can import (including from coleweight), add, remove, and toggle ordered waypoints with /skyblocker waypoints ordered.
skyblocker.tips.visitorHelper: Click on the item name in the visitor helper to buy from the bazaar or click on [Copy Amount] to copy the amount to your clipboard.
skyblocker.tips.slotText: Slot text shows you the attribute shard info, catacombs level, collection level, enchantment book level, minion level, pet level, potion level, prehistoric egg blocks walked, rancher's boots speed cap, skill level, skyblock level in the slot.
skyblocker.tips.profileViewer: You can view other players' profiles with /pv.
skyblocker.tips.configSearch: You can search the entire config using the search bar on the bottom right of the config screen.
skyblocker.tips.compactDamage: Customize your damage value with Compact Damage in the config.
skyblocker.tips.skyblockerScreen: You can access the Skyblocker screen to open the config or checkout helpful links for the mod with /skyblocker.
skyblocker.tips.tipsClick: Click on a tip chat message to run its suggestion!
skyblocker.tips.eventNotifications: Check out the customizable event notifications in the config.
skyblocker.tips.signCalculator: Type an math expression in a sign to have the mod calculate it for you.
skyblocker.tips.calculateCommand: Enter an expression after /skyblocker calculate to have the mod calculate it for you.
skyblocker.tips.fancierBars: Customize the look of your health, mana, defense, speed, and experience bars with /skyblocker bars. You can snap and resize bars too!
skyblocker.tips.crystalWaypointsShare: Share Crystal Hollows Waypoints with /skyblocker crystalWaypoints share.
skyblocker.tips.gardenMouseLock: Lock your mouse while farming in the Skyblocker Garden config.
skyblocker.tips.newYearCakesHelper: Open your New Year Cake Bag and Skyblocker will remember them and highlight duplicate cakes red and missing cakes green.
skyblocker.tips.accessoryHelper: Open your accessory bag and Skyblocker will remember them. The accessory helper will tell you what accessories you have and what accessories are missing.
skyblocker.tips.fancyAuctionHouseCheapHi: Cheap BINs are highlighted in green in the Fancy Auction House.
skyblocker.tips.viewRecipe: Right-Click on a recipe result in the recipe book to access the super-craft menu.
skyblocker.partyFinder.error.name: Party Finder error!
skyblocker.partyFinder.error.message: An error occurred so you've been sent to the vanilla party finder
skyblocker.partyFinder.loadingError: If you see this for more than 5 seconds, something probably went wrong...
skyblocker.reorderHelper.tooltip:
[Skyblocker] You can copy the amount of items
by holding CTRL while clicking on the item!
skyblocker.crimson.dojo.forceHelper.@Too: Shows timer showing how long until a zombie despawns and outlines negative zombies.
skyblocker.crimson.dojo.staminaHelper.@T: Highlights the holes in the walls turning orange once you have been through a wall.
skyblocker.crimson.dojo.masteryHelper.@T: Shows count down to when to release the bow and a path to follow.
skyblocker.crimson.dojo.disciplineHelper: Outlines the zombies to attack with currently held sword.
highlights the newest wool block to go to.
skyblocker.crimson.dojo.controlHelper.@T: Renders an outline around where to aim.
skyblocker.crimson.dojo.tenacityHelper.@: Shows a path for each fireball and predicted block they are going to hit.
skyblocker.waypoints.ordered.import.skyb: Successfully imported waypoints from the Skyblocker Ordered Waypoints format!
§cThis import code doesn't look like its in the Skyblocker Ordered Waypoints format, double-check your clipboard to see if everything is correct.
§cFailed to import waypoints from the Skyblocker Ordered Waypoints format. Make sure to have the waypoint data copied to your clipboard!
skyblocker.chat.confirmationPromptNotifi: Click anywhere on screen within 60 seconds to accept the prompt.
